מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol of all צֹרְרַ֨י <S%H6887><s%> tzo-re-Rai among all mine enemies הָיִ֪יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti have become חֶרְפָּ֡ה <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pah I was a reproach וְלִשֲׁכֵנַ֨י׀ <S%H7934><s%> ve-li-sha-che-Nai among my neighbours מְאֹד֮ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od but especially וּפַ֪חַד <S%H6343><s%> u-Fa-chad and a fear לִֽמְיֻדָּ֫עָ֥י <S%H3045><s%> lim-yud-Da-'Ai to mine acquaintance רֹאַ֥י <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Ai they that did see בַּח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> ba-Chutz; me without נָדְד֥וּ <S%H5074><s%> na-de-Du fled מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. Because
